TEXT.TITLE: CHEYENNE <CHEY.O> TO DISTRIBUTE RIGHTS
TEXT.BODY: Cheyenne Software Inc said it intends to distribute to its shareholders rights to buy common shares of its F.A. Computer Technologies Inc subsidiary on the basis of one sahre of F.A. stock for every two shares of Cheyenne stock owned. Reuter
